AboutPage.title: About AARAPPAR
paragraphs: Welcome to AARAPPAR, where culinary craftsmanship meets contemporary design. Our restaurant was founded with the goal of bringing the warmth of South Indian hospitality to Frankfurt.

Every dish is prepared with carefully selected ingredients, vibrant spices and an eye for presentation. Our dining room combines modern lines with rich colour accents to mirror the balance of tradition and innovation on the plate.
Whether you join us for a relaxed dinner, a festive celebration or a quick lunch break, we strive to make every visit memorable with attentive service and unforgettable flavours.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: We at AARAPPAR Indian Restaurant value your privacy and handle your personal information responsibly in accordance with GDPR and German data protection laws.

purpose.title: Purpose of Data Collection
purpose.content: Your data is collected solely to process table reservations or fulfill your orders. It will never be used for other purposes without explicit consent.

storage.title: Data Storage & Security
storage.content: Your data is securely stored and protected against unauthorized access. Data will be deleted once it's no longer required, or upon your request.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We do not use cookies, except for essential cookies necessary for the basic functionality of our reservation or ordering systems. These essential cookies do not require your consent.
